title: Sanders interview on Real Time
content: The mid-term election is the most important because Dump is a pathological liar and the Repugnantans are enabling him, and they are both undermining democracy, so they must be stopped. Just dumping on Dump is not enough; we need to strongly support a progressive agenda and frame it in value terms that motivate people to vote for it. This also requires changing the Dim Party, which has been corrupted by big money and has forgotten how to motivate its much needed working class voters. Some suggested slogans: we need a government that represents working families, not billionaires; healthcare is a right, not a privilege; make public colleges and universities tuition free.
